long_description: The Jansport Thunderclap daypack is designed to help you through your day whether you're at work, at school or at play. Large main compartment holds your laptop and leaves room for the rest. Large main pocket has a built-in sleeve that fits up to a 15 in. laptop computer or a hydration reservoir (sold separately) and leaves room for folders, books and other gear. S-curve shoulder straps distribute weight evenly; fully padded back panel protects your body from the pack's contents. Includes deluxe exterior-access organizer pocket, zip-front stash pocket, bottom cord storage pocket and easy-access side pockets (1 mesh and 1 fabric). The Jansport Thunderclap daypack has a webbing haul handle for easy grabbing.
short_description: The Jansport Thunderclap daypack is designed to help you through your day whether you're at work, at school or at play. Large main compartment holds your laptop and leaves room for the rest.
